instruction: Refute the following statement:  "Climate change is not real."
output: Climate change is real and is having a significant negative effect on our planet. According to the United Nations Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, global temperatures have risen significantly since the mid-20th century. This warming of the ocean and atmosphere has caused changes in climate across the globe, which are increasingly visible in the form of droughts, floods, heat waves, and temperature extremes.
